messages.subject: Camp fire and scouts and like that...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/29/02 12:45:37 PM, Tuck@midsouth.rr.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/29/02 12:45:37 PM, Tuck@... writes:

<< They're going to be the most decorated kids in the council! I have Pam
S to thank for showing me how do that with educationese. ;) A skill
that easily transfers to other venues. >>

I have links at
http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingotherwise to some sites for scouts and camp
fire (I THINK, maybe 4-H) for which some other folks have pre-educationalized
it.

Holly did scouts for a while. Eeek. Not education. They wanted her to do a
report on girl scouts in China. They told her the Chinese flag was blue and
yellow. I told her it was RED for sure. She said no, the leader said...

And I said there were probably NOT any girl scouts in China.
Her leaders had not thought of that.
Huh.

I know, volunteers... real world... school, or whatever.

There are some Girl Guides being phased out in Hong Kong, so she told them
about that.

Sandra
